meanings.definition: The state or quality of being crabbed or ill-tempered.
meanings.sent1: His constant crabbednesses made it hard to enjoy family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: Her crabbednesses often resulted in arguments with her coworkers.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crabbednesses, he still managed to make everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The crabbednesses in the room were palpable, making the atmosphere tense.
meanings.sent5: The crabbednesses in his voice made it clear he was in a bad mood.

meanings.definition: The act of being difficult to understand or decipher.
meanings.sent1: The crabbednesses of the ancient text puzzled the scholars.
meanings.sent2: The crabbednesses of the instructions left many confused.
meanings.sent3: Trying to decode the crabbednesses of the cryptic message felt like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The crabbednesses of the map led them in circles, unable to find their way out.
meanings.sent5: The crabbednesses of the code seemed unsolvable at first glance.
